title: Scrooge (1935, Christmas film) Colorized | Seymour Hicks, Donald Calthrop, Robert Cochran

sources.title: Scrooge (1935, Christmas film) Colorized | Seymour Hicks, Donald Calthrop, Robert Cochran
sources.description:
Scrooge is a 1935 British Christmas fantasy film directed by Henry Edwards, and is the first feature-length sound film to adapt Charles Dickens' novella A Christmas Carol.

Summary:
On Christmas Eve, the miserly Ebenezer Scrooge is visited by three spirits who guide him through his past, present, and grim future, awakening him to the true spirit of Christmas and the need to change his ways.

Main Actors:
Sir Seymour Hicks - Ebenezer Scrooge
Donald Calthrop - Bob Cratchit
Robert Cochran - Fred
Mary Glynne - Belle
Garry Marsh - Belle's husband
Oscar Asche - Spirit of Christmas Present
Marie Ney - Spirit of Christmas Past 
C. V. France - Spirit of Christmas Future
Athene Seyler - Scrooge's charwoman
Maurice Evans - Poor man
Mary Lawson - Poor man's wife
Barbara Everest - Mrs. Cratchit
Eve Gray - Fred's wife
Morris Harvey - Poulterer with Prize Turkey
Philip Frost - Tiny Tim

NEW HD B&W version: https://youtu.be/T6m1Y9OhrfU

Subtitles are available
